title: Hello, World
description:
Welcome to your first C programming challenge! Write a simple C program that prints the message 'Hello, World!' to the console.

This is the traditional first program for beginners in any programming language, and it will help you verify that your development environment is set up correctly.
hints: Use the printf function from the stdio.h library to output text
Don't forget to include the stdio.h header at the top of your program
Remember that your main function should return an integer (typically 0 for successful execution)
In C, strings need to be enclosed in double quotes
